full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Project Title and Details
#### Supply and Delivery of Laser Tracker

+ **Reference Number**: WS3707628425-Doc3766119217
+ **Solicitation Number**: WS3707628425
+ **Amendment Number**: 1

#### Tender Status
The tender was published on December 30, 2022, and closed on January 16, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.

#### Project Description
The National Research Council of Canada is seeking to acquire the supply and delivery of one (1) Laser Tracker with accessories to be used at Kaleden, BC.

#### Key Requirements
+ **Equipment**: Laser Tracker with accessories
+ **Location**: Kaleden, BC
+ **Number**: 1 unit

#### Important Dates
+ **Tender Closing Date**: January 16, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

#### Contracting Details
+ **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
+ **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
+ **Contact Information**:
  + **Name**: Shaylan Stein
  + **Email**: shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to all qualified vendors, including those from Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).

#### UNSPSC Classification
+ **41000000 - Laboratory and Measuring and Observing and Testing Equipment**

The contact information and relevant details for the tender can be found on the notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15014790?extsite=MTUwMTQ3OTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.
